name: Float (itch) (VanillaBear Studios)
description:
It's stormy out and now your boats in the water!  Stay afloat for as long as you can but watch out for sharks.

- Swim by continually pressing A or D.
- Fend off sharks with your trusty hammer by clicking the left or right mouse buttons (or J/K) but you can't swim and attack at the same time.
